name: Colony On Mars
description: You play as an astronaut in a colony on Mars and you need to upgrade your colony, build new constructions and collect resources
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
